text: Spook the Herd is the fourth studio album by British indie rock band Lanterns on the Lake. It was released on 28 February 2020 under Bella Union. ==Critical reception== Spook the Herd was met with generally favourable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 79, based on 8 reviews. The album was shortlisted for the Hyundai Mercury Prize 2020. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2020 albums Category:Lanterns on the Lake albums Category:Bella Union albums
title: Spook the Herd
